title: Calculate the Bacterium's Weight
text: What is weight W of the bacterium given by: $$W=m g=(1.00$$ * $${10}^{\left(-15\right)}$$ kg)*(9.8 m/s²) in $${10}^{\left(-15\right)}$$ N?

title: Calculate the Ratio of Centripetal Force to Weight
text: Substituting the values from the previous steps: $$F_c$$ $$=$$ $$8.4706$$ * $${10}^{\left(-12\right)}$$ N, W $$=$$ $$9.8$$ * $${10}^{\left(-15\right)}$$ N. What is $$F_c$$ / W?
